00020 from xml.dom.minidom import *
00021 from XML.FB_XML_HANDLER import FB_XMLHandler
00022 from XML.FB_XML_HANDLER import FB_ProductXMLHandler
00023 from XML.FB_XML_HANDLER import FB_AppXMLHandler
00024 
00025 
00026 ##This class contains all Methods to work with the FB-XML Files
00027 class FB_XML:
00028 
00029     __LogObj = None
00030     __DOMObj = None
00031 
00032     ##Constructor
00033     def __init__(self,LogObj):
00034         self.__LogObj = LogObj
00035 
00036     ##return the current DOM-Object
00037     def getDOMObj(self):
00038         return self.__DOMObj
00039 
00040 
00041     ##save Documents to XML
00042     def SaveDocument(self, DOMObj, xml_file):
00043         try:
00044             OutFileObj = open(xml_file,"w")
00045             String = DOMObj.toxml().encode('utf-8')
00046             OutFileObj.write(String)
00047             OutFileObj.close()
00048 
00049         except IOError:
00050             #LOG File
00051             self.__LogObj.NewLog(IOError.message + " " + IOError.filename + " " + IOError.errno,2)
00052 
00053     ##load XML Data from file and save as DOM Object
00054     def LoadDocument(self,xml_file):
00055         try:
00056 
00057             self.__DOMObj = parse(xml_file)
00058 
00059         except IOError:
00060             #LOG File
00061 
00062             self.__LogObj.NewLog(IOError.message + " " + IOError.filename + " " + IOError.errno,2)
00063 
00064     ##parse entire XML-Data-File. All Sub-Handler will be called automatically
00065     ##After that you can call all provided functions to get products,
00066     ##applications, communcations-objects etc.
00067     #@param xml-File: Path and Filename of sourcefile
00068     #@param return: return-value
00069     def parseXMLFile(self,xml_file):
00070         try:
00071             handler = FB_XMLHandler.FB_XMLHandler(self.__LogObj)
00072             saxparser = xml.sax.make_parser()
00073             saxparser.setContentHandler(handler)
00074             saxparser.parse(xml_file)
00075 
00076             return handler
00077         except:
00078             self.__LogObj.NewLog("General error at saxparser: " + xml_file,2)
00079             return -1
00080 
00081     ##detect all Products within the given Product-Data-File
00082     #@return: List of FB_Product Instances
00083     def getProducts(self,xml_handler):
00084 
00085         try:
00086             ProductList = xml_handler.getProductList()
00087             return ProductList
00088 
00089         except:
00090             self.__LogObj.NewLog("Error at 'getProducts'" ,2)
00091             return -1
00092 
00093 
00094     ##detect all Applications within the given Product-Data-File
00095     #@param xml-File: Path and Filename of sourcefile
00096     #@return: List of FB_Applications Instances and Manufacturer-Data
00097     #to get Manufacturer-Data you also have to call getApplications
00098     def getApplications(self,xml_handler):
00099 
00100         try:
00101             AppList = xml_handler.getAppList()
00102             Manufac = xml_handler.getManufacturerList()
00103 
00104             return [AppList,Manufac]
00105 
00106         except:
00107             self.__LogObj.NewLog("Error at 'getApplications'" ,2)
00108             return -1
00109
